title: skype is crashing my league
body: This kind of problem has never happened to me before and I am not sure why it has started now. But as of patch 7.20 whenever I am in a Skype call with friends my league crashes the instant it hits the loading screen. any advice?

replies.body: close skype best advice bro the same thing was happening with discord idk if it's been fixed yet try putting in a support ticket they might be able to look into it :)

Gonna have to second CCam's advice. I'm not sure about any current Skype issues, but Discord's Overlay feature has been causing some major issues with League lately. Try turning off Skype, and making sure that Discord's Overlay is turned completely off.
discord wouldn't crash me but I would have my input and output set to my headset but my voice doesn't go through but I  can hear people, but ill send in a ticket, thank you.
